disc: The original dystopian/ zoodystopian plotline, or the closest we can get to it, pieced together with old and new material released by Disney. In the shinning mammal metropolis of Zootopia, those descended from predatory mammals are forced to wear Tame collars for the safety of society as a whole. But when Nick Wilde tastes freedom, he and his friends plan to hustle it back.

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Romance/Drama - Chapters: 28 - Words: 144,415 - Reviews: 978 - Favs: 552 - Follows: 732 - Updated:
title: Take A Stand
disc: Zootopia is gripped with civil strife over the rights of interspecies couples, whilst a political storm is raging Judy and Nick must be honest with each other. All the while a heist gang are stealing millions from the corrupt and giving it to the poor, it's time for Judy and Nick to stand for what they believe in.
author: Garouge Faux

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Drama/Suspense - Chapters: 13 - Words: 39,238 - Reviews: 153 - Favs: 150 - Follows: 182 - Updated:
title: Inexorable
disc: Long ago, the predators rose up and took over; now the preds have control over Zootopia. Prey are subject to curfew and restrictive laws, the old and weak are culled for food, and the predators live the high life. Nick Wilde is an officer in the predator army's secret police, and Judy Hopps is the leader of a rebel faction. Fate will throw them together...but can they survive?
author: Sophie Ripley

info: Zootopia - Rated: K+ - English - Drama/Mystery - Chapters: 16 - Words: 105,376 - Reviews: 126 - Favs: 192 - Follows: 204 - Updated:
title: The Redemption of Gideon Grey
disc: Judy and Nick are given a task that seems more like a fun getaway: providing a little security for the annual Bunnyburrow Fall Harvest Festival. But things aren't as peaceful as they may now be in Zootopia, and the two cops are thrust into a brand new caper - solved with the help of a certain pastry-baking fox from Judy's past.
author: YFWE

info: Zootopia - Rated: K+ - English - Drama/Romance - Chapters: 9 - Words: 80,258 - Reviews: 118 - Favs: 164 - Follows: 177 - Updated:
title: II: Leaving the Past
disc: The second installment to my Zootopia series, taking place two months after the end of Road to Recovery. A long-awaited visit to Bunnyburrow to introduce Nick to Judy's parents forces the sly fox to revisit one of the most painful memories of his past. Well, Judy's never been one to let the mammals she loves suffer. What follows is their journey deeper into Nick's past.
author: Jayme F Midorikawa

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Romance - Chapters: 23 - Words: 67,592 - Reviews: 150 - Favs: 369 - Follows: 517 - Updated:
title: New Meanings
disc: Nick P. Wilde grew up with little to believe in, dancing through life as a conman until a certain bunny made him change his ways and desires in life. Now, to put those new sights into fruition. It begins with a confession. No one said getting your life together was going to be an easy task, even when you're in a city where anything is possible. Do I own Zootopia? No, I do not.
author: MagicCarpet87

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Romance/Horror - Chapters: 18 - Words: 63,728 - Reviews: 219 - Favs: 153 - Follows: 164 - Updated:
title: Tales of Turmoil
disc: "It's spread everywhere, but that's not to say we can't, you know, survive. We aren't the only ones left." The Nighthowler incident ultimately is much more complicated than originally thought, which leads to dark times in the world of Zootopia. Contains NickxJudy as well. Reviews are much appreciated! Contains dark scenes and horror elements throughout.
author: ATasteOfShadows

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Drama/Suspense - Chapters: 18 - Words: 50,630 - Reviews: 165 - Favs: 144 - Follows: 222 - Updated:
title: Silenced by the Lamb
disc: Judy Hopps saw the mayor turn her best friend into a beast right before her eyes, just before he attacked her. Miraculously she survived - and ended up hospitalized for weeks. When she's finally released, she finds a Zootopia sliding towards disaster. With Bellwether one step ahead, Judy will have to find the allies and courage needed to save both Nick and the city she loves.
author: George J Valtom

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Mystery/Romance - Chapters: 26 - Words: 130,447 - Reviews: 108 - Favs: 171 - Follows: 245 - Updated:
title: Bunny and Wilde
disc: Who knew that two seemingly unrelated murders would lead to the discovery of a major conspiracy. Who knew it would lead to chaos and would shake zootopia to its very core. And more importantly, who knew that it would turn friends into lovers. Conspiracies, secret society, mystery, romance and yes, eventual smut. [Nick x Judy] slow burn.
author: boxopotatoes

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Drama/Romance - Chapters: 15 - Words: 30,020 - Reviews: 101 - Favs: 151 - Follows: 186 - Updated:
title: The Adventures We Set On
disc: Even though Nick and Judy think they solved the mystery, a greater threat appears before Zootopia. Mammals are going savage again, only this time, it's not only predators. The dynamic duo is called again to solve the mystery. This story is not only about adventure, but also Nick having a crush on Judy and her slowly returning his feelings. NickxJudy JudyxNick
author: Titania Erza K

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Romance/Drama - Chapters: 16 - Words: 35,530 - Reviews: 129 - Favs: 150 - Follows: 230 - Updated:
title: Fifty Shades Of Wilde
disc: AU fanfic. Judy Hopps is a writer for the Bunnyburrow News who gets a month to spend in the city of Zootopia where she meets the multi-billionaire, Nick Wilde. She interviews him and finds that there's more that she wants to know about him. But is she willing to do what no bunny has ever thought of with a fox? Read and Review. Criticism is accepted.
author: RayRayofCali

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Horror/Adventure - Chapters: 20 - Words: 49,017 - Reviews: 102 - Favs: 174 - Follows: 136 - Updated:
title: Zombietopia
disc: Zootopia AU. Judy Hopps dreamed of being a police officer for the ZPD, but little did she expect to find the city in ruins, with the bodies of the dead roaming the streets, looking for flesh to dine on. She joins Nick Wilde, a veteran in the zombie war and becomes a member of his faction in hopes of taking the city back for good. Rated T for horror violence and blood. R&R please?
author: Shinigamilover2

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - Spanish - Drama/Suspense - Chapters: 24 - Words: 116,468 - Reviews: 119 - Favs: 52 - Follows: 51 - Updated:
title: Dystopia
disc: Judy jamás descubrió los planes de Bellwether y esta se hizo con el poder, sometiendo a todos los depredadores. Inspirado en el argumento descartado de Zootopia veremos cómo Judy junto a Nick y a un enigmático desconocido llegarán hasta el final para evitar que Bellwether siga con su carrera política, así como para descubrir por que los depredadores se vuelven salvajes.
author: The Chronicler Fox

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Adventure/Romance - Chapters: 13 - Words: 77,279 - Reviews: 225 - Favs: 224 - Follows: 286 - Updated:
title: Red Tails and Wilde Skies
disc: Spring of 1940: The predator Axis has declared war in an effort to subjugate prey species. In their way are the mixed pred/prey forces of Zootopia. Judy Hopps is a young bunny that is pulled into the war when a pilot is shot down over her family's farm and she helps him return to his squadron of Spitfire pilots, an all fox squadron that call themselves the 'Red Tails! Rated T.
author: Selaxes

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Suspense/Drama - Chapters: 21 - Words: 164,430 - Reviews: 105 - Favs: 80 - Follows: 113 - Updated:
title: Zootopia: Death Becomes You
disc: Its been over a year since Bellwether's plot to turn prey against predator. Judy and Nick are now detectives at the ZPD and a budding relationship is forming. However, all turns sour as a new crime wave sweeps the city that threatens to tear the very fabric of society apart. Rated M for extreme violence & strong sexual themes. (In Progress)
author: DarkFlameWolf

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Mystery/Suspense - Chapters: 21 - Words: 61,168 - Reviews: 282 - Favs: 345 - Follows: 487 - Updated:
title: Through a Glass, Darkly
disc: "I see heads." / "And I see tails." / "It's all a matter of perspective" / "The same coin." / "A different perspective." / "Heads." / "Tails." / "Dead." / "Alive." - R. Lutece. Zootopia was once a much darker place. What happens when the Nick Wilde that is and the Nick Wilde that could have been switch places? Reality hopping shenanigans, that's what.
author: WhatABummer

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Hurt/Comfort/Suspense - Chapters: 14 - Words: 51,891 - Reviews: 107 - Favs: 125 - Follows: 195 - Updated:
title: Under an Iron Fist
disc: Nick Wilde found something to be off in Zootopia. Tensions rose after that fateful press conference. The next thing he knows, he's waking up from a coma 3 years later. Predators are forced to wear shock collars, an entire class of species is separated from society, and Nick has to come to the realization that a previous friend might have something to do with it... (Zystopian AU)
author: Cuttooth

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Humor/Romance - Chapters: 11 - Words: 16,122 - Reviews: 144 - Favs: 601 - Follows: 505 - Updated:
title: Zootopia Tails
disc: During a conversation Nick and Clawhauser are having, Judy overhears some unsavory comments and Nick assumes that Judy can't handle that kind of talk since 'she's pure'. Judy isn't pleased with the assumption and insists that she can take a dirty joke as well as the rest of them. Nick decides this is an optimal time to bet her otherwise. Oh the things she learns.
author: Leenden

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Romance/Drama - Chapters: 43 - Words: 138,063 - Reviews: 142 - Favs: 185 - Follows: 225 - Updated:
title: The Pursuit
disc: The Pursuit picks up where Zootopia left off, moving forward with the growing friendship between Nick and Judy, as well as their next case. This story does contain some violence and mature themes, though most are later in the story. Expect some drama along the way, as this story is NOT short and will twist and turn over its course.
author: Lagarde

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - Spanish - Romance/Friendship - Chapters: 8 - Words: 38,151 - Reviews: 229 - Favs: 145 - Follows: 186 - Updated:
title: Parachute
disc: Las cosas en Zootopia marchan a la perfección. O al menos eso pensaba Judy Hopps, quien trata de acostumbrarse a los nuevos cambios en su vida. Pero la llegada de ciertos personajes la harán reflexionar sobre sus sentimientos hacia cierto zorro en particular. Wilde Hopps.
author: MickeyWalker

info: Zootopia - Rated: K+ - English - Chapters: 17 - Words: 121,891 - Reviews: 117 - Favs: 175 - Follows: 288 - Updated:
title: Zootopia: If It Ever Happens
disc: Following the film's events, life in Zootropolis continues! Nick and Judy search for a place to live downtown, face crooks, spies and hassled parents, and hang out together more and more often over monstrous mugs of coffee and dainty cups of herbal tea... a bit too often for two animals who are 'just friends' maybe? Next chapter out soon, stay posted :)
author: ChezIBY

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Romance/Humor - Chapters: 15 - Words: 190,108 - Reviews: 140 - Favs: 253 - Follows: 337 - Updated:
title: Zootopia: Thicker Than Blood
disc: Begins with an expanded peek at Nick Wilde's Academy training, graduation, and first day as a cop with Judy Hopps, then follows the life of Nick and Judy and their budding friendship that becomes more than either imagined. There will be some crimes, life on the beat, slice of life/fluff, and a big undercover caper that will test both of their skills as individuals and partners.
author: aemx

info: Zootopia - Rated: K+ - English - Romance/Drama - Chapters: 8 - Words: 68,277 - Reviews: 114 - Favs: 126 - Follows: 157 - Updated:
title: Zootopia: Parallel lines
disc: 2 years after the infamous savage case. Nick and Judy became the best of friends and the best cops arround. the city is safer than ever. Everything is sweet and roses for our protagonists but what if life is planning to throw a curve at them? What if this curve brings insecurities, egoism and mis-understanding? What if there is another girl? Our heroes are about to find out.
author: Arcticfox66

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Drama/Romance - Chapters: 41 - Words: 183,501 - Reviews: 797 - Favs: 700 - Follows: 886 - Updated:
title: In and Out of Love
disc: A chronicle of the deepening love between Nick Wilde and Judy Hopps. From first dates and meeting the parents to police corruption and a dark threat hunting from the shadows. Events both jeopardize their friendship and draw them closer. Prejudice and promises. Loyalty and confrontations. In Zootopia, no one says you can't dream dangerously. The dream they share takes two.
author: AngloFalcon

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Adventure/Drama - Chapters: 63 - Words: 198,693 - Reviews: 429 - Favs: 358 - Follows: 418 - Updated:
title: A Life Revealed
disc: Nick has recently joined the police force and his new life is beginning. Judy is the revered bunny cop who saved the city and proved those in Zootopia can really be anything. The two start solving cases together, dealing with the changes in the city, hoping things stay the same between them. However, things aren't as they seem in this city, and new stories are about to be told...
author: PyreFerret

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Hurt/Comfort/Tragedy - Chapters: 29 - Words: 108,553 - Reviews: 274 - Favs: 375 - Follows: 473 - Updated:
title: Savage
disc: Someone has improved the Night Howler formula. Now it has spread across Zootopia like a plague. Can hero cops Nick and Judy stop this tragedy? They'll have to survive it first... Rated M for gore, violence and mature themes. Many thanks to: PantheraTigr, ShinyJuJu, WarWolf47, katrinahood, Sunny Lighter, and savannahlovespitbulls. Couldn't have done it without you.
author: ADeadMissionary

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Romance/Crime - Chapters: 28 - Words: 278,746 - Reviews: 217 - Favs: 177 - Follows: 248 - Updated:
title: Two against the world
disc: The story follows life of Nick Wilde after he finally graduates from ZPD academy. Follow as him and Judy fight against the bad and learn that the feelings they have for each other is something more powerful than just friends. Get ready for hell of a adventure as the duo face largest case in Zootopia! I address all the reviews I got at the end of every chapter, not in pv! Much Love!
author: DatCatTho

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Romance/Drama - Chapters: 16 - Words: 77,600 - Reviews: 164 - Favs: 278 - Follows: 413 - Updated:
title: Can A Fox Love A Bunny?
disc: Love has no boundaries right? That phrase is shown perhaps perfectly in Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde who, in the face of adversity, will suddenly decide that love truly does have no boundaries. Follow Nick and Judy as they struggle with their newfound relationship and its many implications along with the backlash they will get from much of Zootopia and even those they care about most.
author: JaysStories

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Hurt/Comfort/Friendship - Chapters: 22 - Words: 51,665 - Reviews: 333 - Favs: 302 - Follows: 444 - Updated:
title: Unnatural
disc: Life in Zootopia is about as normal and peaceful as it gets, apart from the chaos caused by Nick and Judy of course. But tensions are high from recent events, and the unlikely duo is going to be put through a test beyond their comprehension. Their friendship is seen as wrong, and enemies want it to end. They must do everything to keep each other safe, but fate has other plans.
author: Hlbur14

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Romance/Hurt/Comfort - Chapters: 78 - Words: 433,719 - Reviews: 2011 - Favs: 1,206 - Follows: 1,343 - Updated:
title: When Instinct Falls
disc: Society is a fickle thing. It changes inevitably, advancing slowly. But ideas only change if society lets them. Ever since their first case, their bond has only grown. First it was forced comradeship, then friendship. Lastly, they became lovers. But in Zootopia, "Anyone can be Anything". If this is true... Then who says a fox and bunny cannot become mates?
author: upplet

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Adventure/Tragedy - Chapters: 19 - Words: 53,471 - Reviews: 188 - Favs: 259 - Follows: 390 - Updated:
title: The Food Chain
disc: What if Judy and Nick hadn't swapped out the serum for blueberries? As Bellwether tightens her grip on the divided Zootopia, Nick is turned savage for real and committed to solitary confinement. But Judy isn't ready to give up on him, and soon the two are fighting for survival - not just against the world, but against each other. Set during/after an alternative ending to the movie.
author: TheRealMcbasilrocks

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Crime/Suspense - Chapters: 25 - Words: 124,368 - Reviews: 112 - Favs: 94 - Follows: 135 - Updated:
title: Zootopia: THE RAID
disc: When a ZPD raid goes badly wrong, Judy is wounded and forced to stay back while Nick and the SWAT team enter a living hell to take down a ruthless crime lord, but there's more to this sinister criminal organisation than it seems, especially when familiar blue flowers are involved, a dastardly plot is uncovered… and only the ZPD SWAT newest recruits can stop it. Full summary inside.
author: 14sleepyhead09

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - English - Humor/Romance - Chapters: 37 - Words: 162,183 - Reviews: 199 - Favs: 149 - Follows: 223 - Updated:
title: We just call them night howlers
disc: The mastermind behind the night howler attacks is behind bars,the lab that created the drug has been destroyed, and a cure has been made. All should be calm right? Not so much. Judy and Nick have to face a new foe using a familiar drug to cause chaos in Zootopia. Warning: Rated M for major adult themes. You know, the fun kind!
author: Bluelighthouse

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - English - Romance/Hurt/Comfort - Chapters: 21 - Words: 116,693 - Reviews: 232 - Favs: 183 - Follows: 291 - Updated:
title: Primal: A Zootopia Fanfiction
disc: It's been two years since the murder of Nicholas Wilde, and after months of hard work Officer Judy Hopps has finally brought her partner's murderer to justice. She can finally reach closure for the tragic loss when the decision is made to recover Nick's body, still laying where it fell in an abandoned Arctic prison. But nothing is ever as it seems, and even harsher times lay ahead.
author: VeryEagerPerson

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - Spanish - Romance/Crime - Chapters: 4 - Words: 11,633 - Reviews: 134 - Favs: 135 - Follows: 163 - Updated:
title: La Boca del Lobo
disc: Sólo hay un lugar en todo Zootopia donde los deseos más tabús de un depredador pueden ser saciados: la infame Boca del Lobo; un club nocturno con más secretos de los que aparenta. Será el deber de los infiltrados agentes Wilde y Hopps descubrirlos antes de que sea demasiado tarde...¿o caerán víctimas de la tentación prohibida, arruinando su amistad para siempre? (Rating subirá a M)
author: GhostlyMia

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - Spanish - Drama/Romance - Chapters: 5 - Words: 46,493 - Reviews: 121 - Favs: 83 - Follows: 81 - Updated:
title: Zootopia: Noches lluviosas
disc: Nunca los dejes ver que te hirieron. Yo lo hice, lo lastimé, y ni siquiera me importó, él me rogó, me suplicó pero no lo escuché. Ahora se fue, no hice nada para detenerlo, solo lo herí después de prometer que no lo haría jamás, pero él no lo mostró, se mantuvo firme a pesar de mí. Sé que está sufriendo, no merece ese dolor, no fue mi intención, Nick, te suplico el perdón
author: Apheront

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - Spanish - Mystery/Romance - Chapters: 24 - Words: 107,383 - Reviews: 142 - Favs: 36 - Follows: 46 - Updated:
title: Zootopia: Subesse Senatus Romanus (SEPT 2)
disc: Veinte años después de los Olímpicos, un grupo de animales hace acto de presencia. Nick y Judy, con la ayuda de Meloney y Sabrina, deberán protegerse los unos a los otros y encontrar animales de confianza que los ayuden a cazar y capturar a los miembros de dicho grupo, cuyo principal objetivo son ellos dos. Sin saber que todo estaba planeado mucho antes que los mismos Olímpicos.
author: Leonardo Leto

info: Zootopia - Rated: M - Spanish - Mystery/Romance - Chapters: 28 - Words: 101,681 - Reviews: 139 - Favs: 29 - Follows: 33 - Updated:
title: Maestros del engaño
disc: Nick Wilde es un hábil criminal de la mafia que busca ayuda de la talentosa Oficial Judy Hopps para encontrar a una zorra desaparecida y ella le brindará su ayuda sin dudarlo. Lo que Judy no sabe es que para resolver el caso se enfrentará a la especie más astuta , peligrosa y falsa de Zootopia: Zorros. ¿Cuáles son las verdaderas intenciones de Nick? (ADVERTENCIA CAP 28 )
author: Miss G M Fenton

info: Zootopia - Rated: T - Spanish - Romance/Humor - Chapters: 36 - Words: 120,056 - Reviews: 858 - Favs: 492 - Follows: 544 - Updated:
title: ¡Un asunto conejudo! - Zootopia (Zootrópolis)
disc: La relación entre Judy y Nick es muy profesional... pero cuando la pequeña Karin le cuenta a sus padres que su hermanita del alma está trabajando con un zorro, Judy se verá obligada a regresar a Bunny Burrows. Lo que no imagina es... que Nick no se quedará de brazos cruzados. Un lío conejudo, un romance y algo más que una cuestión de "tradiciones" con un toque emocionante.
author: Raygirl13
